content:
Hi, I'm trying to compile rust-semver(https://github.com/rust-dev-tools/rust-semverver)
And I'm getting linking failures which I assume are related to rustc-dev, it can't find the lib: LLVM-10-rust-1.45.0-nightly
full output: https://pastebin.com/raw/u4QGR7hr

I hate that I spend an hour on an issue and I find an answer only after I ask :(
I just found this: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/72594
so adding llvm-tools-preview is required
